morningBrief.headline: Peak Season Mode
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 8" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.headline: Holiday Crowds Expected
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 113 trails open, 67 groomed. Windy with temps around temps TBD. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays. Peak season vibes today. Expect longer lift lines, especially late morning.

morningBrief.headline: 1" Freshened Things Up
morningBrief.body: 1" fell while you were sleeping. The bumps are softer, groomers are primo. Light snow possible in the forecast. Holiday mode: the mountain will be popular. Early birds get the goods.

morningBrief.headline: Fresh Coat on the Mountain
morningBrief.body: 1" of fresh snow settled in overnight. Not a powder day, but an upgrade. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. It's a holiday - expect a full house. Plan for crowds at popular lifts.

morningBrief.headline: Holiday Crowds Expected
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 8" over the last week. Light snow possible in the forecast. Peak season vibes today. Expect longer lift lines, especially late morning.

morningBrief.headline: Peak Season Mode
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 6" over the last week. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: Busy Day Ahead
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 11" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Keep an eye on the sky - a refresh is coming. A few inches on the way.

morningBrief.headline: Peak Season Mode
morningBrief.body: 177/222 trails spinning, 112 freshly groomed. Windy. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome. Holiday mode: the mountain will be popular. Early birds get the goods.

morningBrief.headline: Holiday Crowds Expected
morningBrief.body: 119/120 trails spinning, 47 freshly groomed. 23 and Unknown. Nearly full mountain access with 119 of 120 trails spinning. 119/120 trails open, 47 groomed. 23 and Unknown.

morningBrief.headline: Rain at Base, Snow Up Top
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 166 trails open, 38 groomed. Cloud/Sun/Mixed with temps around 32. Nearly full mountain access with 166 of 170 trails spinning. The elevation will make all the difference today. Rain down low, snow up high.

morningBrief.headline: Holiday Crowds Expected
morningBrief.body: 71 of 81 trails are open with 31 groomed. Unknown with a high of 26.6F. Holiday period means the mountain will be busy. Start early to beat the crowds.
